item.title: KVM Hypervisor Cheat Sheets
item.description: 1. Install Packages Check system is capable of running KVM by running kvm-ok $ apt-get install qemu-kvm qemu-system libvirt-bin bridge-utils virt-manager -y Create KVM/Qemu Hard Disk File $ qemu-img create -f raw <name>.img <Size> ## Example $ qemu-img create -f raw ubuntu14-HD.img 10G Then copy the HD file to /var/lib/libvirt/images/ Launch VM with virt-install virt-install --name spinnaker \ --ram 11096 \ --vcpus=4 \ --os-type linux \ --os-variant=ubuntutrusty \ --accelerate \ --nographics -v \ --disk path=/var/lib/libvirt/images/ubuntu14-HD.
